mission.title: Our Mission
paragraphs: We believe that web development should be fast, accessible, and enjoyable. Too often, developers get bogged down in configuration hell, spending hours setting up linters, build tools, and testing frameworks before writing a single line of product code.

Our mission is to eliminate that friction. By providing a pre-configured environment that follows industry best practices, we empower developers to focus on what matters most: building great user experiences.
This template is not just a collection of files; it's a curated set of decisions that have been battle-tested in production environments.

techStack.title: The Tech Stack
items: **React 18**: The library for web and native user interfaces.
**Vite**: Next Generation Frontend Tooling for lightning-fast HMR and builds.
**Tailwind CSS**: A utility-first CSS framework for rapid UI development.
**Shadcn UI**: Beautifully designed components that you can copy and paste into your apps.
**TypeScript**: Strongly typed JavaScript for better tooling and fewer bugs.

philosophy.title: Design Philosophy
paragraphs: **Simplicity over Complexity**: We prefer simple, explicit code over complex abstractions. If a feature isn't essential, it's not included.
**Performance First**: Every decision, from SSG to image optimization, is made with end-user performance in mind.
**Accessibility Matters**: We believe the web is for everyone. All included components are built with accessibility (a11y) as a priority, ensuring your app works for all users.

community.title: Open Source
paragraphs: This project is open source and community-driven. We assume no one person has all the answers, and we welcome contributions, bug reports, and feature requests.
By building in the open, we ensure that the template evolves with the ecosystem and remains relevant for years to come.
Feel free to fork this repository, customize it for your needs, and share your improvements back with the community.
